title: So.... Twitch jg is feeding?
body: I'm constantly told that I'll be reported for "intentional feeding" by playing Twitch jg, because he's easy to counter in the early game...... but so is EVERY OTHER SQUISHY JG CHAMP! What's the backbone to the argument?

replies.body: Hmm Generally Twitch jg is a coin flip, if the enemy doesn't know about the lvl 2 invade first blood twitch then by all means you should snowball and gank 24/7 to get ur items so your able to actually jg, But if they do know in higher up elo, they'll just play safe by turret and you'll be completely famine of gold as you struggle to kill the jg mobs while their jgler farms and invades/counterjgs better than you do as you're forced to ff 15  as you can't do a thing+ with the funneling nerf, you won't be able to even farm minions as you are getting 10 less gold.

There isn't one.  People are just meta sheep who refuse to adapt and will threaten to report for off meta picks if things don't go well.  For me personally, I play quite a bit of Taric top and jungle and will be called out on my pick if I have a bad game but if I have a bad game on something like Tryn or Trundle they will call me a bad player instead.

> [{quoted}](name=AlienPrimate,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=brHMANyT,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-08-04T03:23:29.074+0000)
>
> There isn't one.  People are just meta sheep who refuse to adapt and will threaten to report for off meta picks if things don't go well.  For me personally, I play quite a bit of Taric top and jungle and will be called out on my pick if I have a bad game but if I have a bad game on something like Tryn or Trundle they will call me a bad player instead.

this is why I've hated meta from S5 up to now, so many people go meta slave
What is your game plan for twitch jg? What do you usually do?

> [{quoted}](name=SugeMinPikk,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=brHMANyT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-04T03:05:29.734+0000)
>
> What is your game plan for twitch jg? What do you usually do?

I take my first camp (normally red) then I early gank mid and get/give first blood then proceed to keeping mid in check until my mid lane finishes their first item

Then I go madman ganking
well you only played twitch JG in normals, not ranked.. so chances say your team had no idea what they were saying..

Mute them. Arguing will do nothing good but get you banned.

If you mean what's the backbone of THEIR argument, there isn't one. They're just tilted and looking for a scapegoat. As long as you play well just don't listen to their bullshit.
They simply have low expectations of you.
